        void moveInDirection(float directionX,

        Move the animal in the given direction The animal move X tiles horizontally and Y tiles vertically with |X| + |Y| = speed X / Y = directionX / directionY X, directionX have the same sign Y, directionY have the same sign

        directionY - the vertical direction
